info.description: This is an Api AuthService for Cool Game Review Api.
info.title: Game Review API

post.description:
An otp code is sent to the email if the user account existed.
An otp ID is returned, which must submitted alongside the otpCode sent to the mail to the Forgot password reset endpoint.

An otp code is sent to the email if the user account existed.
An otp ID is returned, which must submitted alongside the otpCode sent to the mail to the Forgot password reset endpoint.
post.summary: Resend OTP code for Forget password

post.description: The Endpoint resets the user password using the otp code sent to the user's email

get.description: Gets all games, limits and offset can be used to paginate the results
Gets all game genres, limits and offset can be used to paginate the results

post.description: Adds a new game genre, the slug is generated from the title, and it must be unique

409.description: Genre with the same slug already exists

put.description: Updates a game genre, the slug is required

post.description: Returns a signed JSON Web Token that can be used to talk to secured endpoints
Creates a new User/Moderator on the system. The Moderator will need to be manually activated by an existing admin
post.summary: Signup endpoint for all users and moderators

post.description:
An otp code is sent to the email if the user account existed.
An otp ID is returned, which must submitted alongside the otpCode sent to the mail to the VerifyAccount endpoint.

An otp code is sent to the email if the user account existed.
An otp ID is returned, which must submitted alongside the otpCode sent to the mail to the VerifyAccount endpoint.
post.summary: Resend OTP code for account verification

post.description: The Endpoint verifies the user account using the otp code sent to the user's email
